item.title: White House Advisor Reportedly Says Government Shutdown ‘Far Worse’ Than Expected – Warns Q4 Growth Could Get Cut In Half
item.description: White House Advisor Kevin Hassett warned the shutdown could further damage economic growth if it continues another month.

item.title: Flight Cancellations Mount As US Shutdown Hits Day 38: Report
item.description: On Wednesday, the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) ordered a 10% cut in air traffic at 40 major airports to reduce pressure and ensure safety.

item.title: Newmont Corporation Reduces Global Workforce By About 16%: Report
item.description: The reductions include job cuts, unfilled vacancies, and adjustments to role levels, according to a Reuters report

item.title: Trump Administration Seeks Immediate Halt To Court Order Requiring It To Pay Full SNAP Benefits In November: Report
item.description: DOJ attorneys stated that District Judge John McConnell’s order had thrust the Judiciary into the ongoing shutdown negotiations between the Democrats ...
